title: Trestle along an Industrial Site
provenance_text:
Aaron Henry Gorson [1872-1933]. Sold at Sotheby Parke Bernet, New York, NY, on January 29, 1981, lot 117 [1]; Richard M. Scaife [1932-2014], Pittsburgh, PA, by July, 1981 until October 1, 1981 [2]; his gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, October 1981.

Notes:
[1]. Sale entitled "Americana: Paintings, Drawings, Watercolors, Sculpture and Prints," held at Sotheby's Madison Avenue Galleries; this work, illustrated in the catalogue, sold for $800 (see copy from Frick Art Reference Library in curatorial file.)
[2]. See correspondence with Mr. Scaife in curatorial file; other correspondence in the file suggests that Mr. Scaife acquired the work from the Sotheby sale.

creator.death_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
